document_data.name: Ixitxachitl
document_data.mainbody: An '''ixitxachitl''' ({{Pronounce|ik|ZIT|za|chit|ul|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|26}}{{Cite web/Dungeons & Dragons FAQ}}}} {{Plural|ixitxachitls|refs= was an intelligent aquatic race resembling a [[manta ray]] that dwelled in the oceans of [[Toril]].
document_data.Personality: Ixitxachitls were highly intelligent, though were very single-minded and tended towards acts of [[evil]].
document_data.Combat: Ixitxachitls preferred to ambush their prey in groups, lying in wait underneath the sea floor.

Society.Religions: All ixitxachitls revered some form of dark power. While some revered the [[demon lord]] [[Demogorgon]] and considered themselves to be his servants, those in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] worshiped [[Ilxendren]], the patron [[god]] of their race.
Society.Relationships: Ixitxachitls were largely hated by other aquatic life due to their avaricious behaviors and practice of slavery. They were typically known to wage war for territory and feeding grounds against the [[sahuagin]]s, [[locathah]]s, [[merfolk]], and coastal [[human]] settlements. They had an intense rivalry with [[merrow]] over which of them were the superior servants of Demogorgon.
